```
Building the boot loader arguments
Relocating the loader and the BTX
Starting the BTX loader
```

```
# cd /usr/src
# make installworld DESTDIR=/diskless/1
# make installkernel DESTDIR=/diskless/1
# make distribution DESTDIR=/diskless/1
```
